DataElement.preferredName: Peritumoral Tissue Sample Slide or Digital Image Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Alphanumeric identifier for the peritumoral sample slide or digital image.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Peritumoral Tissue Sample Slide Device Component Or Digital Image Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Located in tissues surrounding a tumor._A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation._A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A form of representation in which distinct objects (or digits) are used to express or represent something in the real world._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Located in tissues surrounding a tumor.:A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation.

Concepts.definition: Located in tissues surrounding a tumor.
A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation.
